name: @symbiotic/express-router-adapter
description: ExpressRouterAdapter is a library that makes it easy to build evolvable hypermedia APIs using the express framework

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run lint && mkdir -p dist && tsc -d -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && tsc --watch -p tsconfig.json
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && git checkout gh-pages && cp -R docs/* ./ && rm -rf docs && git add . && git commit -m 'Update docs' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run build

author: Symbiotic Labs <team@symbioticlabs.io> (https://www.symbioticlabs.io)
